reports-desc: Adds a shortcut to adding a "major change" revision tag to the latest revision of an article
reports-field-ignoreusers-help: Additional users to ignore (besides bots). Select multiple users to exclude their edits from the report.
reports-field-debug-help: Display a list of editors who made the updates (slower query)
reports-missingparam-at-least-one-of: {{PLURAL:$2|The parameter|At least one of the parameters:}} $1 is required.
